name: Sightless the Fleshling
description:
Entered via: Flesh rift #20210916
Power level: Creeper
Size: 5 feet/1.52 meters tall
Aspect: Flesh
Secondary Aspects: Pain, Unique


Sightless has had its eyes removed, and weapons forcibly implanted into its flesh, turning its pseudopods into weapons to painfully maim and wound its prey. It’s rumored that this fleshling’s neck was actually already severed, but dark magic from the Pain God keeps it’s large head attached as long as the bandage is never removed. 
--
Fleshlings are pulsing, giant masses of misshapen flesh conjured from the remains of dead, abandoned babies. Characterized by their giant, jawless baby head, these demons use their fleshy pseudopods to grab and hold prey until it can tear chunks of flesh off with its sharp teeth. 

Fleshlings are Creepers due to their vulnerability to terrestrial attacks, as well as their known vulnerability of being incapacitated by dismemberment. Their overall movement speed is slow due to the large mass it has to pull along the ground. When encountering one, remember that while the mass stays the same, their pseudopods can change their length to capture prey who think they’re safely out of reach.
